name: Shiny Shuckle

passive.name: Momentum
passive.effect: Each turn, attach an Energy to Shuckle from your Discard. If you cannot, or when Shuckle becomes your Active Pokemon, discard all Energy attached to Shuckle.

attacks.name: Rollout
attacks.effect: Deals 10 damage for each Rock Energy attached to Shuckle.

flavor: Once they start moving, Shuckle can be very dangerous!
